data.comment: The match is underway. Heerenveen have kicked-off.
Henk Veerman is on target to give Heerenveen a 0-1 advantage.
In the minute 4, Rodney Kongolo with an assist there.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Gyrano Kerk.
Great play from Mark Van der Maarel to set up the goal.
In the minute 45, Pol van Boekel blows to end the first-half.
Pol van Boekel blows to start the second-half. Utrecht with the kick-off.
The home team have replaced Othman Boussaid with Sander Van de Streek. This is the first substitution made today by John van den Brom.
In the minute 48, At Stadion Galgenwaard, Sander Van de Streek has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Johnny Jansen is making the team's first substitution at Stadion Galgenwaard with Rein Smit replacing Henk Veerman.
Ulysses Llanez Jr. Is replacing Arjen Van Der Heide for Heerenveen at Stadion Galgenwaard.
In the minute 73, Ibrahim Dresevic is on a sub for Oliver Batista Meier for Heerenveen.
John van den Brom (Utrecht) is making a second substitution, with Eljero Elia replacing Bart Ramselaar.
Rein Smit (Heerenveen) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 80, The home team have replaced Simon Gustafson with Daniel Arzani. This is the third substitution made today by John van den Brom.
Rein Smit has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
